Package no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.frontend.controller

Class SavingsPlanController

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatg1002.budgetapplication.frontend.controller.SavingsPlanController
public class SavingsPlanController extends Object
This class is the controller for SavingsPlan GUI.

      public void switchToPrimaryFromSavingsPlanMouseEvent(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws IOException
      Switches to the primary view from the savings plan view.

      event - The event that triggered the method.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the primary.fxml file cannot be loaded.

      Switches the view to the primary view from the savings plan view.

      event - The event triggering the method call
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurs

    • onNewSavingsPlan

      public void onNewSavingsPlan(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method handles the event when the user clicks the "New Plan" button. It displays a dialog box where the user can enter the details of the savings plan.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered the method.

    • onDeposit

      public void onDeposit(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Updates the plan's deposit and total savings amount and displays the new total amount saved.
      Parameters:
      event - the event that triggered the method.

    • onEdit

      public void onEdit(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Displays the edit popup to allow users to change details of their savings plan.
      Parameters:
      event - the event that triggered the method.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the SavingsPlanController.

    • onNextSavingsPlan

      public void onNextSavingsPlan(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action event for the "Next Plan" button. This method attempts to select the next savings plan from the current account's savings plans. If successful, the savings plan view is updated to display the selected savings plan's information. If there is no next savings plan, a warning alert is shown to inform the user.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered the method.

    • onPreviousSavingsPlan

      public void onPreviousSavingsPlan(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action event for the "Previous Plan" button. This method attempts to select the previous savings plan from the current account's savings plans. If successful, the savings plan view is updated to display the selected savings plan's information. If there is no previous savings plan, a warning alert is shown to inform the user.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered the method.

    • onDelete

      public void onDelete(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Deletes the currently selected savings plan if one exists.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered the method.

    • updateSavingsPlanInfoText

      public void updateSavingsPlanInfoText()
      Updates text about the current savings plan in the GUI.

      public void updateSavingsPlanMoneyText()
      Updates the text about the current savings plan money information.

    • updateProgressIndicator

      public void updateProgressIndicator()
      Updates the current savings plan progress indicator.
